channel.title: Web acceptance tests on PrestaShop Developer Documentation

item.title: How to contribute and create web acceptance tests
item.description: How to contribute and create web acceptance tests Architecture Page Object Model (also called Page Object Pattern) is a way to organize your code in a test framework. It encourages you to separate your test logic from your page manipulation logic. Our team uses POM as an architecture to organize the code: on one side we have our page logic, and on the other side we have our test logic.
